extendedInfo.description: New Year Puzzles is jigsaw game for phones and tablets.Enjoy of high quality images. The game contains 60 levels with beautiful pictures with Xmas bells, Christmas Tree, Christmas balls, Santa Claus and more. Drag the pieces to the right place to create the image. Use "Peek" button to preview the original image. Completed levels will be unlocked and you can save original images to SD-card. If you can not complete any level you can simple skip it and try to complete it later. Just press "Skip" level button to skip current level.Scoreloop is available. So you can compete with players all over the world.Lets start and enjoy! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
